thread.title: QUIZ: ‘Rivers of Light’ at Disney’s Animal Kingdom
thread.title_full: QUIZ: ‘Rivers of Light’ at Disney’s Animal Kingdom

author: Allison Montgomery
title: QUIZ: ‘Rivers of Light’ at Disney’s Animal Kingdom

organizations.name: england capitol studios in los angeles platinum sound recording studios
new york each animal spirit guide

text:
The newest show to debut at Disney’s Animal Kingdom , “ Rivers of Light ,” just celebrated its debut to Walt Disney World Resort guests this past weekend, bringing to life an awe-inspiring nighttime show on Discovery River. If you’ve seen the show or have been following the updates about “Rivers of Light” here on the Disney Parks Blog , be sure to take our quiz to see how much you know about this new show! ‘Rivers of Light’ at Disney’s Animal Kingdom Where was the musical score for “Rivers of Light” recorded? RCA Studio B in Nashville, Tennessee Abbey Road Studios in London, England Capitol Studios in Los Angeles Platinum Sound Recording Studios in New York City, New York Each Animal Spirit Guide represents a different element. Which element does the Asian Tiger represent? Earth Fire Water The Sky What are the names of the two storyteller characters who appear in “Rivers of Light?” Aseema and Aditya Irina and Kruzhilina Ambu and Ketu Pongo and Perdita Paintings of lotus flowers inside Discovery River Amphitheater, where “Rivers of Light” is performed, symbolize what? Wisdom Enlightenment Compassion Protection Embed Quiz on Your Website Embed Code
Copy and paste above embed code where you would like the quiz to appear on your website.
